tit.e: Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum
Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum
Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum

sen.j: 安土城天主信長の館（あづちじょうてんしゅのぶながのやかた）は、滋賀県蒲生郡安土町にある施設。
sen.e: The Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum is located in Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.
The Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum is located in Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.
The Azuchi Castle Tenshu Nobunaga no Yakata Museum is a facility located in Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 館内には1992年に開催されたセビリア万国博覧会に出展された原型の安土城の復元天守閣（5・6階部分）がある。
sen.e: It houses a replica (5-6 stories) of the tenshukaku (keep or tower), which was exhibited at the Seville World Expo in 1992.
sen.cmt: The relationship between the replica and original is unclear in the phrase "出展された原型の安土城の復元". In other words, what does the 原型 refer to?
sen.e: It houses a replica (5-6 stories) of the tenshukaku (keep or tower), which was exhibited at the Seville World Expo in 1992.
It houses the restored tenshukaku (5-6 stories) of the original Azuchi-jo Castle, which was exhibited at the Seville World Expo in 1992.

sen.j: 1階の館の周りには当時の色々な資料（和紙人形等）や日本全国の城写真があり、ここの限定お土産も売っている。
sen.e: There are a variety of arts and crafts from the period as well as photographs of Japan's castles on display in the area surounding the first floor of the museum, and shops selling limited edition souveniers that are only available there.

There are a variety of arts and crafts from the period as well as photographs of Japan's castles on display in the area surounding the first floor of the museum, and shops selling limited edition souveniers that are only available there.

There are a variety of arts and crafts from the period as well as photographs of Japan's castles on display in the area surrounding the first floor of the museum, and shops selling limited edition souveniers that are only available there.

sen.j: 階段を上がれば館の上階も見られる。
sen.e: Visitors can climb the stairs to see the exhibits in the upper floors of the museum.
sen.cmt: unclear as to how many floors there are.
sen.e: Visitors can climb the stairs to see the exhibits in the upper floors of the museum.
Visitors can climb the stairs to see the exhibits in the upper floors of the museum.

sen.j: 鉄道：JR琵琶湖線 安土駅（あづちえき）下車、徒歩約25分
sen.e: By rail: Approximately a 25 minute walk from JR Biwako Line, Azuchi station
By rail: Approximately a 25 minute walk from JR Biwako Line, Azuchi station
By rail: Approximately a 25 minute walk from JR Biwako Line, Azuchi station

sen.j: 車：名神高速道路 彦根インターチェンジから約35分、八日市インターチェンジから約25分、竜王インターチェンジから約20分
sen.e: By car: Approximately a 35 minute drive from the Hikone interchange; a 25 minute drive from the Yokaichi interchange; a 20 minute drive from Ryuo Interchange off the Meishin Expressway
sen.cmt: unclear as to whether all of these are off of the Meishin Expressway.
sen.e: By car: Approximately a 35 minute drive from the Hikone interchange; a 25 minute drive from the Yokaichi interchange; a 20 minute drive from Ryuo Interchange off the Meishin Expressway
By car: Approximately a 35 minute drive from the Hikone interchange; a 25 minute drive from the Yokaichi interchange; a 20 minute drive from Ryuo Interchange off the Meishin Expressway

sen.j: 滋賀県蒲生郡安土町桑実寺800番地
sen.e: No. 800 Kuwanomiji, Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture
No. 800 Kuwanomiji, Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture
800 Kuwanomiji, Azuchi-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: 大人 個人700円、団体300円
sen.e: Adults: individuals - 700 yen; group rate - 300 yen
Adults: individuals - 700 yen; group rate - 300 yen
Adults: individuals - 700 yen; group rate - 300 yen

sen.j: 学生 個人300円、団体200円
sen.e: Students: individuals - 300 yen; group rate - 200 yen
Students: individuals - 300 yen; group rate - 200 yen
Students: individuals - 300 yen; group rate - 200 yen

sen.j: 子供 個人150円、団体100円
sen.e: Children: individuals - 150 yen; group rate - 100 yen
Children: individuals - 150 yen; group rate - 100 yen
Children: individuals - 150 yen; group rate - 100 yen

sen.j: 館自体には入れず柵の外から見る形となる。
sen.e: It is possible to observe the castle from outside of the fence, without enterin the museum.
sen.cmt: I assume that 館 refers to the castle…
sen.e: It is possible to observe the castle from outside of the fence, without enterin the museum.
It is possible to observe the castle from outside of the fence, without entering the museum.

sen.j: 館内は八角形の形をしており、障壁画が見られる。
sen.e: The interior of the castle is constructred in an octagonal form, and the walls are decorated with paintings.
The interior of the castle is constructred in an octagonal form, and the walls are decorated with paintings.
The interior of the castle is constructred in an octagonal form, and the walls are decorated with paintings.
